content: राज् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (राजति-ते, राजित) {@--1@} ({%a%}) To shine, glitter, appear splendid or beautiful, be eminent; रेजे ग्रहमयीव सा <ls>Bh. 1. 17</ls>; तस्याः प्रविष्टा नतनाभिरंध्रं रराज तन्वी नवलोमराजिः <ls>Ku. 1. 38</ls>; राजन् राजति वीरवैरिवनितावैधव्यदस्ते भुजः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 7</ls>; <ls>Ki. 4. 24</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">11. 6.</ls> ({%b%}) To appear or look (like), shine (like); तोयांतर्भास्करालीव रेजे मुनिपरंपरा <ls>Ku. 6. 49.</ls> {@--2@} To rule, govern. {@--3@} To direct, regulate. {@--4@} To be the first or chief, be at the head. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (राजयति-ते) To cause to shine, illuminate, brighten.
राज् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} राजः {@--1@} A king, chief, prince. {@--2@} Anything best of its kind.
